description:
go/doc: set receiver type position for embedded methods

This was a bug that didn't manifest itself before CL 7674044;
but with that CL and without this fix, the go/doc tests fail.
(The bug fixed by 7674044 and the bug fixed here cancelled
each other out w/ respect to the go/doc tests).

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c359c858d359 ***

go/doc: set receiver type position for embedded methods

This was a bug that didn't manifest itself before CL 7674044;
but with that CL and without this fix, the go/doc tests fail.
(The bug fixed by 7674044 and the bug fixed here cancelled
each other out w/ respect to the go/doc tests).

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7628045

subject: code review 7628045: go/doc: set receiver type position for embedded methods
